lyrics.stanza: Christ is everything, I need Him. He is everything you need, believe Him. Life is a person, receive Him, Open up your heart and sing.
Open yourself to the new creation. Open your eyes to the joy of change. Life is a fruit of God's creation. Every new birth is a soul regained.
Drinking His life from a living fountain. Sweet water running inside of me. Oh, how I love to live on the mountain, Ever since Jesus set me free.
